Zawpui hrong letah a ungpaw Farasi thaikheh taco Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu, na hningzuitu sahlo heh raw tua o,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Ka ca ching he, aaning heh aa de tahmai tah alung sahlo heh a y chua he a,” tatah a palei he.
Jerusalem cawh phah daimang myca he ka, khuapui cawh hmuh ka, a cawkhui.
“Ze tamaw denah heh nama khatah a chuakhui a taheh atoning heh hnih tua la, taheh ka du caimang, canghrasala atoheh cawh na hmuh ly rua pawtah nokhai na cang myca.
Na carae sahlo tah nama tuh nápawtah raetuhnah ing ca sahso he ka, ca cadung he ka, a kawkih tah a ca dawkhai he ka, khunglai hmai na piathlah khylynah cai a phah tae a.
Nama le na hawkaw chung letei a ungpaw sahlo cawh alui letah aa ca nangpabai thlu he a. Khazing nama khatei a vongnah cai khah a hnih lypaw hratah na tuanah cawtah na chung letei alung sangkheh tei hmai palehly lytah aa seisaipaw ung a be,” tatah a tah.
Mataico Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka, hming a zua leimeipaw sahlo khah a tingchua he.
Aa hai leco, “Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang, ‘Ka ing cawh thlawchangnah ing tah a cang a,’ canghrasala naaning taco, ‘Mehru kua,’ tah naa tua,” a tah he.
Ning tating tah behnah ing leco cawngpah he ka, canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le zawpui hrong letei hruitu sahlo taco, Ama cawh thaw pawtah khua aa khang leimei thlang.
Cawngsaw vytei cawh a bia reipaw khah aa lung a cang tu thah cawtah zekhatamaw kaa tua a, tahpaw khah hnih khy bei he.
Ning kheh cawh Zisu tah zawpui khah behnah ingdung chung letah cawngpah he ka, thawngchawbia a ching leimeining he takhei, tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh macang sahlo khakhei Ama khatah a vong he ka,
“Ze nawhnuinah tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua? Ma nawhnuinah heh ahomaw a ca pei? Ma ching tua,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a.
Johan tah baptisma pehnah naw a hnuipaw khah vaicung taitah maw, cawngsaw taitah maw?” tatah a palei he.
Reisia he ka, “ ‘Khazing taitah,’ tah my peh seh la, ‘Zemaw Johan cawh naa zing be?’ a ma tah a.
Canghrasala, ‘Cawngsaw taitah,’ tah my peh seh la, zawpuipaw tahei alung tah aa ma vaseh a, zecawtamaw tatah aaning tahei Johan cawh Khazing khuavang a cang tah tlung he ka,” aa tah.
Macawtaco, “Ze taitah maw tahpaw hnih bei peh,” tatah aa chai.
Zisu taco, “Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hrá bei neh,” tatah a tah he.
Zisu taco ma tawchingnah bia heh zawpuipaw khah a ching he. “Cawngsawpaw tah misur buichung tua ka, male khah hlei he ka, a sypui ry pawtah khua a tlong.
Hre cai a cang tihtah a sae pakheh khah ama a ting hangpaw pakhong pawtah ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw. Canghrasala ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco a sae cawh dai he ka, kih longpaw tah aa kawsah kaw.
A sae hringpaw khah taw kaw ka, canghrasala ma paw zong cawh dai he ka, ningzaw chuipaw tah tua he ka, zehmai peh lytah aa kawsah hrah.
A pathungnah a va taw vy tihtah ma paw zong cawh hmaw phosah he ka, khungthing lang aa vathlang.
Mataico misur buichung a hnuitupaw taco, ‘Zekhatamaw ka tua a? Ka dopaw ka sawcapaw heh ka taw a. Ama heh cawh aa cizaw phung thlang pui ta,’ a tah.
Canghrasala ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah, ‘Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang, thé he peh ka, a ry a lah ná peh seh,’ aa tah.
Macawtaco ama cawh misur buichung alailang khah piakhui he ka, aa thaw. Ma tih taco misur buichung a hnuitupaw takhei aaning sahlo cawh zekhatamaw a tua he a?
Va seí ka, ly a hlangpaw sahlo khah thé he ka, misur buichung khah ahringpaw khah a hlei he a,” a tah he. Ma bia cawh zawpui tah aa thui tihtah, “Ma hraco cang thai by be!” aa tah.
Zisu tah aaning cawh mingpai he ka, “A cang caco, Capathai letei aa ciapaw heh zemaw a silang a cang? ‘Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh, a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang,’ tahpaw heh.
Ahohmai ma alung cung letei a tlahpaw cawngsaw cawh kuichy thlu he ka, ma alung tei a tlahsopaw cawngsaw heh cawh a mang cici he a,” a tah he.
Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo tah ma tawchingnah bia a reipaw cawh aaning a rei hnopaw he a cang takhah hnih he ka, Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui. Canghrasala zawpui khah aa ci he.
Zisu cawh tai lytah ngia thlang he ka, mehding hratah a tua pakheipaw he cawngsaw a ngiatu sahlo khah aa taw he. Rom raang uhtu bui a hmingtuakhynah le a nawhnuinah chung letah Zisu khah aa hlai khy nápaw cawtah a reipaw bia khei Zisu khah tle pawtah a pachia he.
Macawtaco male a ngialaipaw sahlo tah Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu na reipaw le na cawngpahnah heh ahmangpaw cang ka, aho hme hmai ming lytah Khazing langpui khah biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah he tahpaw kaa hni.
Macawtaco kaa cawtah Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah a zia aa thaipaw khah hnih ka, aa hai leco,
“Denari tangka phae pa hmusah tua o. Aho lingthlaw le cakhai maw a cia?” tatah a tah.
Aaning taco, “Sizar a lingthlaw le cakhai,” tatah aa palei. Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Sizar a tei cawh Sizar pei la, Khazing a tei cawh Khazing pei my lo,” a tah he.
Ma zawpui hme letei a reipaw bia lekhei a suanah cawh tle khy bei he. Taico a biachainah khah aa ningang ka, a de thlang he.
Mehthi thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi thaikheh cawh Zisu kha a vong he ka bia aa hae.
“Cawngpahtu, Moses phungbia letah cawngsawpaw cawh sawtei sah lytah a nupui a thih sai caco, a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la, a thipaw caw takhei sawtei sah pápaw a cang, a tah.
Uikheh cawh uny pasarih a ung he. A uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka, sawtei sah lytah a thi.
Mataico, a pahningnahpaw tah lahmeno cawh chui kaw ka, a thih sai hui.
A uny a pathungnah a cangpaw taco chui vy ka, a thih sai hrah. Aa pasarih co, ma canuno cawh chui cy he ka, sawteisah lytah a thi thlu he.
A hning cai tah ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah.
Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma canuno cawh aho a nupui maw a cang a? Aa pasarih tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung,” aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Khazaw cawngsaw heh aa chui aa hae he.
Canghrasala, mehthi sahlo patho kaw a cang tihtah ma cai letei a ung tlang pawtei rawhpaw cawngsaw sahlo aa cai leco a chuihae cawh ung khaw a be.
Vaiming hratah cang he ka, thi khy khaw bei he. A thokawpaw sawtei sahlo aa cangnah cawtah aaning cawh Khazing sawtei a cang myca he.
Canghrasala chingbu me tei a kangpaw phungpaw lekhei Moses tahmai tah mehthi sahlo aa thokawpaw khah palang ka, Abuipaw cawh ‘Abraham Khazing, Isak Khazing, Jakob Khazing’ a cang a tah.
Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be, canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang. Zemaw tah pawco ma cawngsaw vytei cawh Khazing mehmuh letaco a hring he,” tatah a palei he.
Phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh tah, “Cawngpahtu, bia na paleipaw he a chah caimang,” tatah aa chai.
Taico ahotahmai bia hringpaw hae ngang khawh bei he.
Taico, Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Ze silang tamaw Khri cawh David pathlah aa tah?
David ama ceingei tei a reipaw cawh, ‘Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh, na carae sahlo khah na phe rai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh, ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo a tah,’ tatah a tahpaw khah Reithainah Hlaw cabu letah a cia.
David tah Khri cawh, ‘Abuipaw,’ a tah tlung, zekhatamaw David a sawcapaw cawh a cang thai a?” a tah he.
Zawpuipaw tah aa nge thlang chung takhei Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh,
“Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a raering my lo. Aaning cawh a ngepaw angki a pasuapaw a hrei tah a khia lai du he ka, chodo tlaang lekhei cizaw hmotah bia a ching khah aa du hlui tah synagog letah a chaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ka, kawngchuanah letah achaw caipaw hminghmaw khah aa du.
Lahme sahlo aa ing khah chu he ka, male hmuh ruapaw tah thlaw a sypui tah aa chang. Ma hapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh a sah caipaw dangtahnah aa ing tae a,” tatah a tah he.
Zisu cawh a kahui ka, mehrung sahlo tei behnah ing tholong thingkawng chunglang aa tholong aa thlah leimeipaw khah a hmuh.
Mehsisah lahmeno tei phaesai phaehning a thlah hrahpaw zong khah a hmuh.
“Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma mehsisah lahmeno tahei aho navy zong tah a hlu cai tholong a thlah.
Ma sahlo vytei tahei co aa hnuipaw a hluipaipaw chung taikhei aa peh. Canghrasala ma lahmeno tahei co a dongchia hmo tah a hringnah caw tei a hnuipaw vytei a peh thlu hi,” a tah he.
A hningzuitu thaikheh taco behnah ing khah a hmui a ngepaw alung sahlo tah le Khazing letei hlaipaw cho le pe sahlo tei aa pasangpaw kong cawh aa rei leimei. Canghrasala Zisu tah,
“Ma lehei naa hmuhpaw vytei he alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw a ung lynah cai a va chuh tae a. Aa zongmingtei hei va hly thlu a cang tae he a,” a tah he.
Aaning sahlo taco, “Cawngpahtu, ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a? Taico ze hapaw paching pakhanah maw a ung a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Aho tahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo. Ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka, ‘Kama heh Ama cawh ka cang, cai a ne myca,’ aa tah tae a. Ma sahlo cawh zui khe lo.
Raetuhnah le raang chung letah rae a dynah thongpang naa thui tihtah a pahly khe lo. Ma hming sahlo heh a tlung taw ruapaw a cang, canghrasala a changnah cang balang be,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico aa hai letah, “Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka, painah le painah a dy he a.
Aling a sah pui tah a hrui a, hming hlupui letah cakaang le ngae-y asawnah a tlung a. Mataico, cichuipaw hming sahlo le paching pakhanah a rungnawpaw sahlo avai taitah a lang a.
Canghrasala, ma vytei hlai tahei ca tle he ka, aa ca hrai he a. Synagog sahlo lang ca seikhui he ka, thong aa ca thla he a. Siangpahrang sahlo le uhtubui sahlo hme letah ca chuakhui he ka, ma vytei heh naa pa zuinah rawng tah a cang a.
Ma heh naa cawtah ka kong reinah caichaw a cang a.
Naaning a rungvai nápaw cawtah zekhatamaw bia kaa rei a tatah lung reithui tah naa ung ly nápawtah naa thinglung a pacy pacia my lo.
Naa carae ahohmai tah aa ca te khy ly nápaw he tah le aa ca ei khy ly nápaw he tah bia sahlo le singnah ka ca pae he a.
Naa no sahlo le naa paw sahlo, naa uny sahlo, naa sawny sahlo le naa huivesaw sahlo tahmai tah ca luithae a he ka, meh thaikheh cawh aa ca thaw he a.
Kama ka rawng tah cawngsaw vytei tah aa ca hua he a.
Canghrasala, naa lu cung letei sangbu bukheh hmai lyde a be.
Cy ky tah a daw la, hringnah naa cy a.
Raekeh sahlo tah Jerusalem khuapui aa cadungpaw naa hmuh tihtah a ry hlai tah a rawh a, tah cawh naa hni a.
Mataico Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh la, khuapui leteipaw sahlo cawh pia he seh. Taico khuapui alailang leteipaw sahlo cawh khuapui chunglang a nae kheh he seh.
Ma heh cawh dangtah nápaw cai, Khazing bia letei a ciasipaw vytei a tling nápaw khah a cang.
Ma ning cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a! Raang chung letah rorangnah alaipaw pui tlung ka, Khazing thingaenah tah ma mingphing heh a carae he a.
Aaning cawh zyzi tah thaw cang he ka, thaikheh cawh raang ting letah sae tah seikhui a cang he a. Khazing tah Gental cawngsaw sahlo cawtah a pachiapaw cai a tlingnah tai Jerusalem cawh Gental cawngsaw sahlo taco aa phe tah aa tlaichai a.
Ning, thlawpaw le esi sahlo letah paching pakhanah a ung he a. Rili tuileh a thopaw le a pyraw rawng tah aluicung raang sahlo cawh thlawzawng le ningping tah a ung he a.
Khazaw letei hming a va tlung lepaw khah aa hninah cawtah le avai hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh aa cang a cawtah mehnung cawh ci tu he ka, a cathing he a.
Ma cai leco aaning tah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw khah hmingtuakhynah le rungnawnah khatah meding hrong letah a vongpaw khah aa hmuh a.
Ma hming sahlo cang hrang a pathoning tahei a daw la, a huichy my lo, zecawtamaw tatah naaning tlang nápaw cai cawh a ne myca,” tatah a tah he.
Ma khy taico Zisu tah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he. “Ma thuiku kung le thingkung ahringpaw vytei sahlo heh mingtua hmai o!
A chawng a ka thopaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tahpaw naa hni.
Ma hraco ma hming sahlo heh a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca tah hnih my lo.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang bei he.
Alui le avai cawh a rawh a, canghrasala ka bia cawh a rawh by a be.
A raering my lo, ma tei a cang ly caco a nawngsenah, zu ruinah le tungtuh khuasahnah lungreithuinah takhei ca nai a he ka, ma ning takhei ahui hratah rawh ly pui tah a ca o pang he a.
Ma ning cawh aluicung pungpaluh letei a ungpaw cawngsaw vytei cung letah a tlung a.
A va chuh lepaw vytei taitah naa lua khy nápawtah le Cawngsaw Sawcapaw hme letah na daw pacy khy nápaw he ceh tah a mai pacia tah ung paria thlang la, thlawchang my lo,” a tah he.
Ning tating tah Zisu taco behnah ing letah cawngpah he ka, zailang maikaw cawh Oliv tlaang aa tahpaw letah zai hmang rua pawtah a piathlah tei.
Taico ming vytei cawh a bia nge rua pawtah mongdi tah behnah ing leco a va chuh tei he.
Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah le Khungsai Panawnah aa tahpaw a ne myca ka,
tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Zisu thaw khy nápaw lang le si khah aparuh teitah aa hui, zecawtamaw tatah zawpuipaw khah aa ci he.
Mataico, a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Iskariot aa tahpaw Judas chung letah Setan cawh a nae.
Taico Judas cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le behnah ing a mingkaitu abui sahlo khatah sei ka, zekhatamaw Zisu a luithae a tahpaw kong khah aa reisia.
Aa thawchah ngetei ka, tangka peh rua pawtah aa naw a tlah.
Judas zong cawh a lungtling ka, zawpui aa ung ly kaa tah aa kih letah Zisu hlai khy nápaw caichaw khah a haw thlang.
Mataico Khungsai Panawnah cawtah tuu teitei tah thuihlainah ning a cangpaw raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning cawh a va phah.
Zisu tah Piter le Johan cawh taw he ka, “Sei la, kaa cawtah Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh va pachia tua o,” a tah he.
Aaning taco, “Zeletamaw va pachia he seh tah na du?” tatah hae he ka,
Zisu taco, “Khuapui chung a va nae la, beirai tah tui a cui laipaw capaw pakheh tah a ca tong he a. Ama a naenah ing lang va zui he ceh ka,
ing a hnuitupaw khah, ‘Cawngpahtu tah ka hningzuitu sahlo khatah Khungsai Panawnah zairia ka e nápaw mehlai khang zeletamaw a ung, a tah,’ tatah naa hae a.
Ama taco a cung khang a kypaw pui, tingtua cia tei a cangpaw khah a ca hmuh sá he a. Ma leco va pachia my lo,” tatah a palei he.
Piter le Johan cawh seithlah he ka, Zisu tah a chingpaw he hrakhei hming sahlo cawh aa va hmuh. Ma leco Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia.
A cai a va tling tihtah Zisu le Ama apostol sahlo taco cabuai cawh aa cadung.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Kama cawh ruhanah ka ing hlai tahei naaning khatah ma Khungsai Panawnah zairia e hrui heh ka du ngetei.
Macawtaco ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang letah ma Khungsai Panawnah tlingnah cai a tlung hlai vytei ma zaibatui heh e kaw khaw bei neh,” tatah a tah he.
Taico ny khah law ka, Khazing letah alawngnah bia hlai ka, “Ma misurhang ny heh law la, a hlai pachaw my lo.
Ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang a va chuanah tai ma misurhang heh ding kaw khaw bei neh,” tatah a tah he.
Taico very cawh law ka, Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka, aaning cawh pei he ka, “Ma heh naa cawtah ka pehpaw ka pung cawh a cang hi. Kama monghly ly nápawtah tua tei my lo,” a tah he.
Ma hraco zairia aa e khy taitah ny cawh law ka, “Ma ny heh naa caw tei a laipaw, ka thisai tei tuapaw biahrai thapaw cawh a cang.
Kama a pa lui a paw cawngsawpaw cawh ma lehei kama khatah cabuai letah a ung.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Khazing bia thlia ciapaw hratah a thi a. Ma duitei cawh Ama a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping,” tatah a tah he.
Aaning le aaning cawh ahomaw ma hming heh a tua a, tatah aa hae he.
Aaning hrong letah ahomaw alaicai a, tahpaw bia a einah zong khah aa hrong letah a chuh.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Gental cawngsaw sahlo cung letei abui sahlo cawh a buisah ngetei he ka, aa nawhnuinah aa hmangpaw cawh, ‘A ca bawngtu ka cang he peh,’ tatah aaning le aaning a tah he.
Canghrasala naaning cawh aaning hratah ung khe lo! Naa hrong letei alaicaipaw cawh a chia caipaw hratah ung hri seh la, uhtu a cangpaw taco sae hratah ung hri seh.
Ahomaw alai vy? Cabuai letei a typaw maw batui a peitu maw? Cabuai letei a typaw cawh lai vy bei maw? Canghrasala kama cawh male rai hrepah tu pakheh hratah naa hrong letah ka ung hi.
Naaning cawh hanah ka ingpaw vytei letah a pa dawkhuitu na cang he ceh.
Taico ka paw tah painah raang a pa pehpaw hratah naaning khah ca pei hrá he neh ka,
macawtaco ka painah raang letei ka cabuai letah e he ceh ka, naa ding a. Abui dyching letah a ty he ceh ka, Israel phinghraw hluihning khah bia naa ce he a.
Simon, Simon, lythlopaw tah sacang a vangpaw hratah Setan tah naaning khah hnehsah a pawtah nawhnuinah hmuh a du my ca.
Canghrasala Simon, na zingnah cawh a po ly nápawtah na cawtah thlaw ka chang thah. Taico kama lang na va hui kaw tihtah na uny sahlo khah thawzaang pei my lo,” a tah.
Canghrasala Piter taco, “Abuipaw, nama khatah thongtlá tah thihnah tai ka mai thlang,” tatah a palei.
Zisu taco, “Ka ca ching, Piter, atoning aa a khawng hlai tahei na pa hninah lehei uithung tai na pa paphahsai a,” tatah a chai.
Mataico, Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Tangka ly, sahre lytah le phepakong lytah ka ca taw tih he tah ze na phahlahnah he ceh a ung maw?” tatah a hae he. Aaning sahlo taco, “Ung be,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Canghrasala atoheh cawh tangka naa hnui caco a kai la, sahre zong a kai la, taico zyzi naa hnui ly caco naa angki pasuapaw khah zua la, co my lo.
Ma hrahei Capathai letah ciapaw a cang, ‘Taico ama cawh hmingsua a tuapaw sahlo khatah reipai a cang a.’ Ma heh kama letah a tling ruapaw a cang tah ka ca ching he. A cang, ka kong a ciapaw heh a tlingnah cai a phah leimei myca,” a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco, “Abuipaw, mingtua, zyzi sanghning a ung thlang hi,” tatah aa tah. Zisu taco, “A zaw seh,” tatah a palei he.
Zisu cawh a tua teipaw hrakhei Oliv tlaang lang cawh sei ka, a hningzuitu sahlo tah Ama cawh aa zui.
A hminghmaw cawh aa phah tihtah aa hai leco, “Tuhsonah chung lang naa tlah ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo,” a tah he.
Ama cawh aaning khah a cawngpe va long he ka, a khuh panai ka, thlaw a chang.
“Vy Ka paw, na naw a tlah pawtei a cang caco ma tai-ingnah ny heh kama taitah law hly thlang. Canghrasala kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh,” a tah.
Vaicung taitah vaiming pakheh cawh ama kha a za paly ka, thawzaang a peh.
Taico a lung rei a thui tunah cawtah khei lungsaw chingching tah thlawchang vy hui ka, a mathlai cawh thi di hratah alui letah a tlah.
A thlawchangnah taitah tho ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei a vaw kaw tihtah aa ihningpaw khah hmuh ka, ngechia tah aa ung cawtah aa thaw a chang.
“Zemaw naa ihning thlang? Tho la, tuhsonah chunglang naa tlah ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo,” tatah aaning cawh a tah he.
Ma hratei a rei leimeining taco cawngsaw rungpui va chuh he ka, aaning sahlo cawh a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas aa tahpaw takhei a va seikhui he. Zisu cawh hnang rua pawtah khei a va ne.
Canghrasala Zisu tah ama cawh, “Judas, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh hnang ceh ka maw, na luithae a?” tatah a tah.
Zisu a hningzuitu sahlo tah, hming a cang leimeipaw khah aa hmuh tihtah, “Abuipaw, kaa zyzi hei kaa tuh a he maw?” tatah aa tah.
Taico aa hrong letei pakhehpaw tah tlangbui alaicaipaw a sae capaw khah tuh ka, a cacang lang tei a naw khah a pathai thlah.
Canghrasala Zisu tah, “Ma khah a zaw myca,” tatah a tah. Taico cawngsawpaw a naw khah tong ka, a dangsah.
Mataico Zisu tah Ama a va seihnopaw tlangbui macang sahlo le behnah ing a congpaw sahlo aa bui sahlo le macang sahlo he khah, “Zyzi le thingtai kha naa va seipaw heh kama cawh rae a thopaw he hotu tamaw ka cang?
Ning tating tah naaning kha behnah ing letah ung tei neh ka, ka cung letah naa kih naa thlah tlung be. Canghrasala ato cai heh cawh muinah tei a uhpaw naaning naa cai a cang,” a tah he.
Mataico Zisu cawh tle he ka, seikhui longmang he ka, tlangbui alaicaipaw a ing chunglang taikhah a naekhui he. Piter tah langhlaw pui khei a zuilai.
Canghrasala inghme a le lekhei me tua he ka, me a ai tah a ty cadungnah pawhe lekhei Piter cawh aaning sahlo khakhei hmingkheh tah a ty hrah.
Saecanu pakheh tah Piter ma letei a typaw khah a hmuh. Ma no taco ama cawh va mingchai ka, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh Zisu kha a ungpaw a cang,” a tah.
Canghrasala ma cawh a paphah ka, “Cawngsawno, Ama heh hnih bei neh,” tatah a tah.
A cawngpe ung ka pakhehpaw tah Ama cawh hmuh ka, “Nama zong aa hrong letei pakheh na cang,” a tah. Piter taco, “Cang bei neh,” tatah a palei.
Suimehlang pakheh tluh lekhei ahringpaw pakheh tah, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh Galili cawngsaw a cangnah cawtah hei Zisu kha a ungpaw a cang hrahring,” a tah.
Piter taco, “Na rei leimeipaw kong heh hnih bei neh,” tatah a palei. Ma hratei a tah leimeining taco aa cawh a khawng.
Abuipaw cawh Piter lang cawh a hui ka, a va ming. Taico Piter cawh Abuipaw tei a hai letei a reipaw, “Atoning heh aa a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphah sai a,” a tahpaw khah a thui kaw.
Taico alailang piathlah ka, o tlili tah a cah.
Zisu cawh a congpaw raevai sahlo takhei pasipasa he ka, aa cabai.
Aaning sahlo taco a meh pamai he ka, “Ma ching tua, nama Khazing khuavang! Ahomaw a ca tuh?” aa tah.
Taico ma sahlo taco Ama cawh aisainah bia a hlupui tah aa tah.
Khua hme a se cangkawleh biacetu macang a cangpaw sahlo cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khakhei hmingkheh tah a tong he ka, Zisu cawh aa hme lekhei aa va chuakhui.
“Khri cawh na cang maw? Ma ching tua,” aa tah. Zisu tah, “Ka ca ching zong he tah pa zing bei ceh.
Ka ca hae zong he tah pachai bei ceh.
Canghrasala ma taihei co, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing a cacang lang letah a ty myca a,” tatah a chai he.
Aa zongmingtei co, “Khazing Sawcapaw cawh na cang maw?” tatah aa hae. Zisu taco, “Khazing Sawcapaw na cang tatei naa reipaw cawh ahmang,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico aaning taco, “Ze hringpaw biahninah maw kaa hia khawh? Ama a hmo taitah ma bia kaa thui thah taico,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico a pahmopaw vytei cawh tho he ka, Zisu cawh raang uhbui Pilat khatah aa seikhui.
Taico, Ama cawh sua pu he ka, “Ma paw tahei kaa mingphing a pingpaly tah a hruipaw he kaa hmuh. Ama tahei Sizar khatah ngungkhui pei khe law tah ka, Khri a cangpaw siangpahrang ka cang a tah,” tatah aa tah.
Macawtaco Pilat tah Zisu cawh, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw?” tatah a hae. “A cang, na reipaw hraco a cang,” tatah Zisu tah a palei.
Mataico, Pilat tah tlangbui macang sahlo le zawpuipaw cawh, “Ma paw sua pho rua pawtah hei a chahlynah zehmai hmuh bei neh,” tatah a thang he.
Canghrasala aaning sahlo taco, “Ama tahei Judia raang pungpaluh letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh a cawngpah ná tah hnahnawhnah a chuasah. Galili taitah a patho ka, ma tai heh a va phahpaw a cang,” tatah thaw tah aa rei.
Ma cawh a thui tihtah Pilat taco, “Ma paw heh Galili cawngsaw maw a cang?” a tah he.
Zisu cawh Herod a uhnah rai letei a ungpaw Galili raang cawngsaw a cang tahpaw khah Pilat tah a hni tihtah ma ningcai letei Jerusalem letah a ung thlangpaw Herod khakhei a seisah khui he.
Herod tah Zisu a hmuh tihtah a lung a lawng ngetei, zecawtamaw tatah cai sypui hmuh a za du ngetei cawtah a cang. Zisu a thong khah a za thui teinah cawtah ningang chuipaw hming sahlo a tuapaw khah ka hmuh myca a, tatah a hnabei a sui.
Bia a hlupui hae cakhia ka, canghrasala Zisu tah zehmai chai be.
Tlangbui macang le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh ma leco a daw thlang hrah he ka, Zisu cawh a sah pui tah sua aa pu leimei.
Mataico, Herod le a raekeh sahlo tah Zisu cawh hnuiso he ka, aa pasi aa pasa. Pai achaw ngeteipaw a buhsah he ka, Pilat khatah aa seisah kaw.
Ma ning taico Pilat le Herod cawh huivesaw a cang he. Ma hlai taco a za carae tei he.
Pilat tah tlangbui macang sahlo le uhtu sahlo le zawpuipaw khah y pahmo he ka,
aa hai letah, “Ma paw heh zawpui khah carae tah a thosah he tatei kama kha naa va chuakhuipaw khah a cang. Ama heh naa hmekaw letah haecakhia neh ka, reipachia tei sua naa pupaw heh a dongkhang be tatah ka hmuh.
Herod zong tah, a suanah hmuh be ca ka, kaaning kha a va ma kua kawpaw a cang. Naa hmuh thlangpaw hratah thih tlang a tlahpaw hming zehmai tua be.
Macawtaco chei sá he neh ka, mataico ka thlaw a,” tatah a tah he.
Khungsai Panawnah ning maikaw letah Pilat tah thong a tlahpaw chung taitah pakheh khah a thlaw hrahring ruapaw a cang.
Zawpui sahlo cawh hmokheh tah y hrui he ka, “Ama cawh theh thlang la, Baraba khah ma thlawpah hri,” tatah aa tah.
Baraba cawh khuapui chung letah rae a tho sahpaw a cang rawng tah le lee a nongpaw rawng tah thong a tlahpaw a cang.
Pilat tah Zisu cawh thlaw a dunah cawtah khei aaning cawh a hae hry he.
Canghrasala aaning taco, “Khraws letah khaipai! Khraws letah khaipai!” tatah a y vy tima he.
A uithungnah leco aaning cawh, “Ze rawng tamaw? Ma paw tahei ze suanah ky maw a tua? Thihnah tai dangtá pawtah a panah zehmai hmuh bei neh. Macawtaco chei sá he neh ka, ka thlaw a,” tatah a tah he.
Canghrasala, Ama cawh khraws letah khaipai tatah tai lytah a thangpui tah y he ka, aa ypaw takhei Pilat khah a pahnei.
Macawtaco Pilat tah aa haepaw khah peh a pawtah bia a chaw.
Pilat taco hnahnawhnah le lenongnah rawng tei thong a tlahpaw, aa haepaw Baraba khah thlaw ka, aa dunah hrakhei tua rua pawtah Zisu cawh a hlai he.
Zisu cawh raekeh sahlo tah seikhui he ka, langpui letah khuatei lang tah khua a va tlongpaw Sairin khuapaw Simon khah tle he ka, khraws cawh a cung lekhei khing he ka, Zisu hninglang khei aa puhsah lai.
Cawngsaw a rungpui takhei pazui he ka, a cawtah a ngechia katei, a cahpaw canu sahlo zong a ung hrah he.
Zisu tah a paleh ka aa hai leco, “Jerusalem sawcanu sahlo pa cawkhui khe o, naaning naa cawtah le naa sawtei leh cawtah cah hri my lo,
zemaw tah pawco, ‘A cingpaw canu sahlo, sawtei a pho bang lypaw chi le meimei zai bang lypaw hnabae sahlo cawh bonghnang a tingpaw a cang he,’ tatah naa tah nápaw cai a va chuh a!
Mataico, ‘aaning sahlo tah tlaang sahlo cawh, “Ma tlahso law,” tah he ka, tlangby sahlo khah, “Ma vuh law,” aa tah he a.’
Ma hming sahlo heh cawngsaw tah thingkung a hring thlang ningtah hmai aa tua caco, thingkung a ro tihtah co zemaw aa tua chichi a?” a tah he.
Ahringpaw cawngsaw pahning, mehsua va vei khah Zisu khatah thaw hrui rua pawtah aa seikhui hrah he.
Luru hming aa tahpaw hminghmaw aa va phah tih taco, ma leco Ama cawh damia sahlo khakhei pakheh khah a cacang lang letah pakheh khah a cavui lang letah aa khaipai he.
Zisu taco, “Apaw, ngethai my lo, aa tua leimeipaw heh aa hnilynah cawtah hei,” tatah a tah. Taico raekeh sahlo taco basung phe he ka, a chaichi cawh a chaichy he.
Zawpuipaw cawh ma lekhei a daw he ka, ming thlang he ka, uhtu sahlo tahmai tah aa hnuiso. “Cawngsaw ahringpaw cawh pachah he ka, Khazing a thingpaw, Khri a cang hmuisui caco, ato heh ama le ama cawh a pachah seh,” tatah aa tah.
Raekeh sahlo zong taco a vong he ka, Ama cawh pasipasa he ka, misur zu a thobahlapaw khah aa hlai.
“Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang na cang caco nama le nama a pachah ca,” tatah aa tah.
A lu cung letei ca a ciapaw cawh, “MA HEH JUDA CAWNGSAW AA SIANGPAHRANG A CANG,” tah heh a cang.
Ma letei aa pathle hrahpaw suanah a tuapaw pakhehpaw taco Ama cawh naisui hmo khei, “Khri cawh cang bei ceh maw? Nama a pachah la, kaaning zong ma pachah hrah tua!” tatah a tah.
Canghrasala, mehsua ahringpaw pakheh taco raw ka, “Khazing hmai heh ci bei ceh maw? Ama khatah a lopaw tah hreh na cangpaw heh!
Kaaning cawh hreh tlang ka cang peh, kaa tuasanah khatah a tlahpaw kaa hmuh hi. Canghrasala ma cawngsaw heh cawh suanah zehmai tua be hi,” tatah a tah.
Mataico ama taco, “Zisu, na painah raang na phah tihtah a pa thui thlang my lo,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco ma cawngsawpaw cawh, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching, kama khatah Paradis letah atoning na ung hra a,” tatah a chai.
Ningching suimehlang hluihning hrong taitah zailang suimehlang pathung tai raang pungpaluh letah muinah a tlung,
zecawtamaw tatah ning a khainah khah a calinah cawtah a cang. Taico, behnah ing letei pai pazypaw cawh pehning tah a hria chy.
Zisu tah a thangpui tah, “Apaw, nama khatah ka thlawpaw ka chia,” tatah a y. Ma hraco a rei khy cangkawleh cawh a hu a ceh chung.
Ma cawh raekeh zakheh buipaw tah a hmuh tihtah Khazing cawh reithai ka, “Ma cawngsaw heh mehding a cang hrahring thlang,” tatah a tah.
Ma hming ungzia hnikhui rua pawtei a pahmopaw cawngsaw vytei tah ma hming khah aa hmuh tihtah ngechia tah aa cacanghnaw a cung he ka, a seihly thlu he.
Canghrasala, Galili raang tai tei a va zuipaw canu sahlo reipai tah Ama a hnihpaw vytei taco a langpa khei a daw he ka, ma hming sahlo cawh aa cai thlang.
Ma leco Juda khongsil chung letah a taepaw mehchaw mehding a cangpaw Josef aa tahpaw ung ka,
bia aa thliapaw le rai aa hrepaw cung letah a nawtlah beh. Ama cawh Judia raang, Arimathea khua taitah a vongpaw cang ka, Khazing painah raang a va tlungpaw a heh thlangpaw a cang.
Pilat khaco va sei ka, Zisu a rawh cawh a va hae.
Mataico a rawh cawh khraws taitah lawthlah ka, paithladih anaipaw tah pahlong ka, alung kho aa ruipaw thlai thapaw ahohmai aa phung bang lynah pawhe lekhei a isah.
Ma cawh ningpangaw ning Sabat ning cawtah pachianah ning cang ka, Sabat ning cawh a patho daimang tei.
Galili taitah Zisu khatei a va seipaw he canu sahlo takhei Josef cawh zui he ka, athlai le a chung letei rawh cawh zekhatamaw aa isah tahpaw khah aa hmuh.
Mataico aaning cawh ing lang a dih he ka, a rawh cawtah ringthopaw sahlo le zihmui ringthopaw aa pachia. Canghrasala phungbia aa zuinah cawtah khei Sabat ning leco a hia he.
Zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw mongdi letaco canu sahlo cawh aa pachiapaw sathy ringthopaw sahlo khah a tle he ka, thlai lang cawh aa va sei.
Aaning sahlo taco thlai taitah alung a hneihlypaw cawh aa hmuh,
canghrasala a chunglang a nae tih he tah Abuipaw Zisu a rawh cawh hmuh bei he.
Ma leco lunghnahnawh tah aa ung thlang ning takhei, sungkheh teitah cawngsaw pahning, aa caise lailaw hratei a khai thai ngetei pawhe khah aa kae letah a va daw he.
Canu sahlo cawh aa ci cawtah khei alui lang a bung he ka, canghrasala capaw pahning taco, “Zecawtamaw mehthi hrong letah mehring cawh naa hui?
Ama cawh ma lehei ung khawh be, a thokaw thah! Galili raang letah naaning khatah a ungning tei a ca chingpaw he khah a thui thlang bei he ceh maw?
‘Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh mehsua sahlo kih letah peh a cang a, khraws letah khaipai he ka, ningthung ning letah a thokaw a,’ a tahpaw khah,” aa tah he.
Mataico canu sahlo taco Zisu a bia khah a thui kaw he.
Thlai lang tah a va dih kaw he ka, ma hming vytei khah a hningzuitu hluikhehpaw le ahringpaw sahlo cawh aa ching he.
Aaning sahlo cawh Mari Makdalin, Joana, Jeims a no Mari le aaning khatei a ungpaw ahringpaw, ma kong apostol sahlo a chingpaw he khah a cang he.
Canghrasala, aaning sahlo taco canu sahlo tei aa reipaw cawh bia tah sah be ca he ka, zing bei he.
Ma duitei cawh Piter suipaw cawh tho ka, thlai lang khah a va sai. A bung ka, ming ka, thlai chung letei Zisu aa pahlongnahpaw paithladih cy khah a hmuh. Taico seithlah ka, hming a cangnah silang kong cawh a khuarawh a haa ngetei.
Ma ning lilaw leco Zisu a hningzuitu letah pahning cawh Jerusalem taitah khang sarih tluh a hlahpaw Emau khua lang cawh a sei he.
Aaning cawh pakheh le pakheh khah a cangpaw hming vytei kong khah aa reihrui lai.
Ma hming sahlo kong cawh reilai he katei, bia a rawh laining he takhei, Zisu cawh va chuh ka, aaning khaco a sei hrah,
canghrasala aa bi khy nápawtah pakhang a cang he.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Naa seipai tah ze bia maw na rawh lai he ceh?” tatah a tah he. Aaning cawh a daw he ka, aa hme a chia thlang.
Aa hrong letei pakhehpaw Kleopa aa tahpaw taco Zisu cawh, “Jerusalem khuapui a va tlongpaw letah nama cy heh ato cai letei hming a cangpaw sahlo heh a hnih lypaw cang ceh maw?” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Zehming maw?” tatah a hae. “Nazaret Zisu kong samaw,” tatah a palei. “Ama cawh Khazing khuavang pakheh cang ka, ming hme le Khazing hme lekhei bia le tuanah letah hming tuakhynah a hnui.
Tlangbui macang sahlo le a ma uhtu sahlo tah thaw rua pawtah nawhnuitu sahlo khatah bia pei he ka, khraws letah aa khaipai.
Canghrasala Ama cawh Israel mingphing a tlang ruapaw he pakheh a cang, tatah kaa hnabei a suipaw khah a cang. Ma hlui co ma hratei hming a cangnah heh atoheh a ningthungnah a cang myca.
Ma hlui co, kaa phu chung taitah canu thaikheh sahlo tah kaa ning aa ma angsah. Ato zamong mongdi khei thlai lang va sei he ka,
canghrasala a rawh hmuh bei he. Kaaning khatah a vong he ka, Zisu cawh a hring thlang tatah a reipaw he vaiming sahlo a palypaw he khah kaa hmuh tatah aa ma ching.
Mataico kaa vesaw thaikhehpaw tah thlai lang va sei he ka, canu sahlo tei aa reipaw hrakhei aa va hmuh, canghrasala ama cawh hmuh bei he,” aa tah.
Zisu taco aaning cawh, “Na hruh caimang he ceh, Khazing khuavang sahlo tei aa za rei ciapaw vytei zing nápawtah naa lungthing a ku a chaw caimang!
Khri tah ma hming sahlo heh a tai-ing ceingeipaw cang ka, taico a rungnawnah lang a naepaw cang bei maw?” a tah he.
Aaning cawh Moses le Khazing khuavang sahlo vytei tei Ama a kong Capathai letei aa reipaw naning tei hrakhei a chingpase he.
Aa va sei nápaw khua khah aa va phah daimang tihtah Zisu cawh langhlaw vy lang a sei ruapaw hrakhei a tua.
Canghrasala aaning taco, “Kaaning kha a reh thlang. Zailang cang ca ka, ning a tlah daimang myca hi!” tatah hmuisui teitah aa thly. Macawtaco aaning khaco ria rua pawtah a sei.
Aaning sahlo kha cabuai letah a ty thlangning tah very cawh law ka, alawngnah bia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka, aaning cawh a peh he.
Taico Zisu hni khynah cawh peh cang he ka, ama cawh aa bi. Taico, ama cawh aa mehmuhnah taitah a ly thah.
Pakheh le pakheh cawh, “Langpui letei kaaning kha bia reilai katei, Capathai a ma ching pase laining takhei kaa chung letah kaa lungthing khah me kangpaw hratah cang bei maw kha?” a tah he.
Sungkheh tah tho he ka, Jerusalem lang cawh aa kawkaw. Ma leco a hningzuitu hluikheh le aaning khatah a ungpaw sahlo he a za pahmo thlang he katei,
“Ma heh ahmangpaw a cang! Abuipaw cawh thokaw ka, Simon khatah a paly,” tatah a za rei leimeipaw he khah aa hmuh he.
Mataico, ma tlaw pahning taco langpui letei hming a cangpaw le very a kychy ning tei Zisu aa binah kong khah aa ching he.
Ma bia aa rei chung vytei cawh Zisu cawh aa hrong letah a daw thlang ka, aaning sahlo cawh, “Naaning khatah thlawlungnah ung ky seh,” a tah he.
Aaning sahlo cawh a pahly he ka, aa ci ngetei. Athlaw kaa hmuh tatah aa rawh.
Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh, “Zecawtamaw naa lung reithui ka, lung langlo tah naa ung?
Ka kih le ka phe heh mingtua hmai o, kama pui ka cang caw! Pa tong la, naa hni thlang a. Athlaw taco ka hnuipaw, naa hmuhpaw hapaw ru le ngaisaw cawh a hnui tlung be!” tatah a tah he.
Ma bia a rei khy taikhei a kih le a phe cawh a hmuhsah he.
Aa khuarawh a haa tu cawtah le aa lung a lawng tu cawtah khei zing khy thly be ca he ka, “Ma lehei epaw naa hnuipaw a ung maw?” tatah a hae he.
Aaning taco ama cawh aa pakang ciapaw ngawsaw vy kheh khah pei he ka,
ma ngaw cawh law ka, aa hmekaw leco a e.
Aa hai leco, “Naaning khatah ka ung ning takhei ma heh ka ca chingpaw he khah a cang. Moses phungbia cabu le Khazing khuavang sahlo aa cabu le Reithainah Hlaw cabu chung letei Kama ka kong ciapaw vytei cawh patling a cang tae he a,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico Khazing Capathai sahlo aa thui khy nápawtah aa thinglung ning a pavang he.
Aa hai leco, “Ma heh Capathai letah ciapaw cawh a cang. Khri cawh reithui sisaw ing ka, ningthung ning tah thihnah taitah a tho kaw a,
taico, Ama a ming tah angepachihnah le sua ngethainah kong cawh Jerusalem taitah patho he ka, mingphing vytei khatah rei a cang tae a.
Naaning sahlo cawh ma hming sahlo heh a hnikhuitu na cang he ceh.
Ka paw tei bia a kang ciapaw khah naaning khatah ka za taw a, canghrasala hmingtuakhynah vaicung taitah naa hmuh hlai vytei cawh Jerusalem khuapui chung lekhei ung thlang my lo,” a tah he.
Aaning sahlo cawh Zisu tah piathlah khui he ka, Bethani khua kae aa phah tihtah a kih pazy ka, bonghnang a song he.
Bonghnang a song leimei ning he taco, aaning sahlo cawh seisai he ka, vaicung lang lah chy tah a cang.
Mataico aaning sahlo taco Ama cawh beh he ka, a lawng ngetei tah Jerusalem lang cawh aa kawkaw.
Taico, Khazing reithai hmo khei behnah ing leco aa ung thlang tei.
Ahrangthonah letah bia a ung. Ma bia cawh Khazing khatah a ung; Bia cawh Khazing a cang.
Ahrangthonah taitah Khazing khatah a ung.
Ama taco zezong vytei heh a tua, tuapaw hming vytei heh Ama tah a tua lypaw zehmai ung be.
Ama letaco hringnah a ung. Ma hringnah cawh cawngsaw vytei khainah a cang.
Akhaipaw cawh a muinah hrong letah va khai ka, muinah taco ma cawh pahnei be.
Cawngsaw pakheh Khazing tei a tawpaw ung ka, a ming cawh Johan a cang.
Khainah kong khah hni sá pawtah le reilai rua pawtah a va chua, ming vytei tah Ama a thongtah aa zing khy nápawtah.
Ama cawh akhaipaw cawh cang be, akhaipaw kong khah a hnikhuitu ruapaw tah a va chuhpaw a cang.
Akhaipaw hmuisuipaw, ming vytei a khai sahpaw cawh a ung, khazaw lehei a vong leimei.
Ama cawh khazaw lehei a ung, khazaw heh Ama tah a tuapaw a cang naná teitah khazaw tah Ama cawh hnih be.
Ama a mehnung a cangpaw sahlo khatah a vong ka, a mehnung sahlo tah Ama cawh cyhlang bei he.
Canghrasala Ama a cyhlangpaw vytei, Ama a ming a zingpaw vytei cawh Khazing sawtei cangnah naw a peh he.
Ma sahlo cawh cawngsaw phunglang tah sahpaw cang bei he. Taico cawngsaw biachawnah le pasaepaw dunah hratah sahpaw zong cang lytah Khazing taitah sahpaw a cang he.
Bia cawh pungsaw tah a va lang ka, kaa hrong letah a cing lai. Paw tei a hnuitlakangpaw Sawcapaw hratah a rungnawnah zia kaa hmuh; ningdonah le biahmuisui tah a chih.
Johan tah a konglang reilai ka, ma hrahei tlang a y, “Ma cawngsaw heh a konglang ka reipaw, ‘ka hninglang tah a va chuh lepaw cawngsawpaw cawh kama navy tah alai vypaw a cang, zecawtamaw tatah kama hlai tah a ung ciapaw a cang,’ tahpaw khah,” tatah a tah.
A ningdonah a tlangtlingnah taitah a bonghnang cawh sangkheh khy sangkheh tah kaa ting cy.
Phungbia cawh Moses letah peh cang ka, ningdonah le biahmuisui cawh Zisu Khri thongtah a va ung.
Ahotahmai tah Khazing cawh hmuh bang bei he. Canghrasala Sawcapaw hnuitlakangpaw, Paw khatei a ungpaw taco Khazing cawh a palang.
Jerusalem letei a ungpaw Juda cawngsaw sahlo tah tlangbui sahlo le Levi mingphing cawngsaw sahlo cawh Johan khaco taw he ka, “Ahomaw na cang?” tatah aa haesah tih he tah, Johan tah ma hrahei a bia a phy.
Ma sahlo hai letaco a paphah ly teitah, “Kama cawh Khri cang bei neh,” tatah a palei he.
Aaning sahlo taco, “A cang caco ahomaw na cang? Elija na cang maw?” tatah aa tah. Johan taco, “Cang bei neh,” a tah he. “Khazing khuavang kaa haw thlangpaw cang cei?” tatah aa tah vy. “Cang bei neh,” tatah a palei vy he.
A changnah letaco, “Ahomaw na cang tahpaw achaw teitah ma ching tua. Aa ma siapaw sahlo hai letah zehratamaw kaa ta he a. Na konglang heh achaw teitah ma ching, ahomaw na cang?” tatah aa tah.
Mataico Johan taco Khazing khuavang Isaiah a bia khah hmang ka, “Kama cawh, ‘Abuipaw cawtah langpui pading pah my lo,’ tatei raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o cawh ka cang,” tatah a tah he.
Taico aa tawpaw he Farasi thaikhehpaw sahlo taco Johan cawh ma hrahei bia aa hae hri,
“Zecawtamaw Khri na cang tlung lypaw le Elija maw, Khazing khuavang maw na cang tlung lypaw tah baptisma na cangsah he?” tatah aa tah.
Johan taco, ma hrahei a palei he, “Kama taco tui tah baptisma ka ca cangsah he. Canghrasala naa hrong letei a ung thlangpaw, naa hni lypaw a ung.
Ama cawh ka hninglang tah a va chua a, kama cawh a phepakong rui a thlangpah tlangpaw hmai cang bei neh,” a tah he.
Ma sahlo heh Jordan tuivaw raechai lang letei a ungpaw Bethani khua, Johan tei baptisma a cangsahnah pawhe letah a cang.
Ningthlamongpaw letaco Johan tah Zisu cawh ama khatah a vong lai leimeipaw khah hmuh ka, “Mingtua o, Khazing tuu teitei, khazaw suanah a photu ruapaw kheh.
Ama heh, ‘Ka hninglang tah a va chuh lepaw cawngsawpaw cawh kama navy tah a lai vypaw a cang zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh kama hlai tah a ung ciapaw a cang,’ tatei a kong ka reipaw cawngsaw khah a cang.
Kama tah ama a cang tahpaw khah hnih bei neh. Canghrasala Israel cawngsaw sahlo khatah a va paly khy nápawtah tui tah baptisma ka cangsah he,” tatah a tah.
Taico Johan tah ma hrahei a tah, “Thlawpaw Pathai cawh avai taitah thury hratah a cung letah a za cawng thlangpaw khah ka hmuh.
Baptisma cangsah lai rua pawtei a pa tawpaw tah, ‘Thlawpaw cawh a cung letah a za cungpaw le, a cung letah a cawng thlangpaw na hmuh caco, ama cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tei baptisma a cang sahtu ruapaw a cang a,’ tatah pa ching lytah ung my seh la, ama cawh hnih a bei neh.
Atoheh cawh hmuh myca neh ka, ama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw a cang ceingei tahpaw khah ka rei ngang,” tatah a tah.
A monglangpaw letah Johan cawh a hningzuitu pahning khatah ung he ka,
Zisu a khiakaly leimeipaw khah hmuh ka, a hningzuitu sahlo hai letaco, “Mingtua o, Khazing Tuu teitei khi,” tatah a tah.
A hningzuitu pahning taco ma hratei bia a reipaw khah thui he ka, Zisu khah aa zui.
Taico a hninglang a hui ka, Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Zemaw naa hui?” tatah a tah he. Aaning taco, “Rabbi, (Cawngpahtu tahnah a cang) zeletamaw na ung?” tatah aa tah.
“A vong la, naa hmuh thlang a,” tatah a palei he. Taico aaning cawh a ungnah lang a vaw he. Chahningtlaw zailang suimehlang papali hrawng tai khah Ama khaco a ung he.
Simon Piter a unypaw Andru cawh Johan bia a reipaw a thuipaw pahning hrong letei Zisu a zuipaw khah a cang.
Andru taco a hmetawcai letah a unypaw Simon cawh huilai ka, a hai letaco, “Mesiah (ma cawh Khri tahnah a cang) cawh kaa hmuh thah,” tatah a tah.
Taico Simon cawh Zisu khatah a va seikhui. Zisu taco ming ka, a hai letaco, “Johan sawcapaw Simon, nama cawh Sifas (ma cawh Piter tahnah a cang) aa ca tah myca a,” tatah a tah.
A ningthlamongpaw letaco Zisu cawh Galili raang lang sei pawtah a pachia. Taico Filip cawh hmuh ka, “Va pa zui,” tatah a tah.
Filip cawh Andru le Piter sahlo khatei khuakheh letah a ung hruipaw a cang. Ma cawh Bethsaida khua a cang.
Filip tah Nathaniel cawh hmuh ka, a hai letah, “Moses tei phungbia letei a konglang a ciapaw, Khazing khuavang sahlo zong tei a kong aa reipaw, Nazaret Zisu, Josef a sawcapaw cawh kaa hmuh myca,” tatah a tah.
Nathaniel taco, “Nazaret taitah hmingchaw a piathai thlang maw?” a tah. Filip taco, “A vong la, mingtua,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah Nathaniel cawh Ama lang a va pange lai leimeipaw khah hmuh ka, “Mingtua o, Israel cawngsaw hmuisuipaw, Ama letah dinglynah a ung lypaw hi,” a tah.
Nathaniel taco, “Zekhatamaw na pa hni?” a tah. Zisu tah a hai letah, “Filip tei a ca y hlai letei thuiku kung rai letah na ung thlangning takhei, ka ca hmuh,” tatah a tah.
Nathaniel taco, “Rabbi, nama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw, Israel Siangpahrang na cang,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “Thuiku kung a rai letah ka ca hmuh, ka tah cawtah na zingpaw cang ka, ma navy hei a rungnaw vypaw a hlupui na hmuh tae a,” tatah a tah.
“Biahmuisui ka ca ching, avai ingkaw a hong a ka, Khazing a vaiming sahlo cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cung letah aa cungchuh, aa kechypaw khah na hmuh tae a,” tatah a tah vy hui.
A ningthungnah letah Galili raang, Kana khua letah nupui chuinah a ung. Zisu a no cawh ma leco ung ka,
Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo zong cawh ma nupui chuinah leco aa hrui hrah he.
Misurhang a chang tihtah, a no tah Zisu hai letaco, “Misurhang a chang thah,” tatah a ching.
Zisu tah a hai letah, “Dopaw canu, nama tah zemaw na pa ching rua a ung? Ka cai phah balang be hi,” tatah a tah.
Taico a no taco cungtlahtu sahlo hai letaco, “A ca chingpaw longmang hratah tua my lo,” tatah a tah he.
Aa kaepang tei letaco alung beirai sangruh, Juda cawngsaw sahlo tei a sipathainah aa tahpaw cai letei aa hmang teipaw cawh ung ka, ma alung beirai sangkheh cawh tui kalan songthung hrawng a tlungpaw a cang.
Zisu tah cungtlahtu sahlo hai letaco, “Beirai sahlo lekhei tui chi sah my lo,” a tah he. Taico alung beirai cawh a tlang tai long tah tui aa chisah he.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Atoheh alung beirai letei tui cawh thai la, cung a tlahpaw sahlo hruitupaw khah va pei o,” tatah a tah. Taico thai he ka, aa va peh.
Cungtlah hruitupaw taco misurhang tah a cang thah ciapaw tui cawh a pateh. Canghrasala zehratamaw ma hraco a cang tahpaw khah hnih be, tui a thaipaw he cungtlahtu long takhei aa hni. Taico nupui a chuipaw khah y ka, a hai letaco,
“Cawngsaw maikaw tah misurhang a hring khah va tle taw he ka, khuachai vytei tah dutaw tah aa ding khy taitah a hning tah a tesi aa va tle tei. Nama duitei cawh athoning tei navy tah achaw vypaw khah ato tingtai na pakhei thlang,” tatah a tah.
Galili raang, Kana khua letei Zisu tah a tuapaw, ma ningang chuipaw heh a tuapaw letah a hmetaw caipaw a cang. A rungnawnah cawh palang lai ka, a hningzuitu sahlo taco Ama letah aa zingnah khah aa pahnia.
Ma khy taico a no le a uny sahlo le a hningzuitu sahlo khaco Kapernaum khua lang cawh cungthlah he ka, ma leco ning cuitei a cang he.
Taico Juda cawngsaw aa Khungsai Panawnah cai cawh phah daimang ka, Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang a sei.
Jerusalem letei behnah ingdung chung letei a ungpaw sahlo, sahring a zuapaw le tuu le thury sahlo a zualaipaw le cabuai letei tangka a thlaipaw sahlo khah a hmuh he.
Mataico khyhrui cawh thingrui tah tua ka, behnah ingdung chung letei a ungpaw tuu le sahring vytei cawh zeipatlaw he ka, a papia thlu he. Tangka a thlaipaw sahlo aa tangkasaw vytei khah thehly pah thlu he ka, aa cabuai sahlo vytei khah a palehly thlu he.
Thury aa zualaipaw sahlo aa hai letaco, “Piathlah thlu tua o, zekhatamaw ka Paw a ing cawh cho donah tlang tah naa tua ngang zia?” a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Na ing caw tei ka chahnai ngenah taco a pa e seh thlu myca,” tatei aa ciapaw bia khah a thui he.
Taico Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco, “Ma hming vytei tua rua pawtah hei naw na hnui tahnah tah zehapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah maw na ma pae a?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Ma behnah ing heh chehthlah la, ningthung chung tah ka padaw kaw thlu cehceh a,” a tah he.
Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco, “Ma behnah ing heh kung songli le kung ruh sahpaw tah cang ka, ma cawh ningthung chung tah na paling khy maw?” aa tah.
Canghrasala a rei dunah silang cawh Ama a pungsaw kong khah a cang hri.
Thihnah taitah a tho kaw khy taitah ma hratei bia a reipaw khah a hningzuitu sahlo tah a thui kaw he. Capathai letei a ungpaw le Zisu hmokaw bia sahlo khah aa zing.
Jerusalem letei Khungsai Panawnah chung letaco, Zisu tah ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a hlupui a tuapaw sahlo khah ming hlupui tah hmuh he ka, a ming cawh aa zing.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh aaning sahlo letaco a ngengang be, zecawtamaw tatah ming vytei khah a hmuh pahleh thlu he.
Cawngsaw kong cawngsaw tah chingpase khah Zisu cawh hia be, zecawtamaw tatah Ama tah cawngsaw chung letei a ungpaw khah a hni thlu.
Farasi hrong letah pakheh, a ming Nikodema aa tahpaw cawh ung ka, ama cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo a uhtu khongsil macang hrong leteipaw a cang.
Zaicing tah Zisu khaco a vong ka, a hai leco, “Rabbi, nama cawh Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw cawngpahtu na cang tahpaw kaa hni. Khazing tah a ungkhui ly caco he na tuapaw hming hapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah heh ahotahmai tah tua khy bei he,” a tah.
Zisu tah ma hrahei a palei, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching, ahohmai aa pitha ly caco, Khazing painah raang hmuh khy bei he,” tatah a tah.
Nikodema taco, “Cawngsaw cawh a macang khy taitah zekhatamaw a pitha thai khaw a? A no a chi chunglang a nae kaw tah a pi kaw thai khawh tlung be,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah ma hrahei a chai, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching, ahohmai tui le Thlawpaw tah a pi ly caco, Khazing painah raang a nae bei he.
Ngaisaw taco ngaisaw a sah kaw, Thlawpaw taco thlawpaw a sah hrah.
‘Na pitha ruapaw a cang,’ tatei ka ca tahpaw heh na ningang kheh seh.
Thli cawh a dudú tah a hrang, a pyraw na thui. Zelang tamaw a va chua, zelang maw a sei a tahpaw na hni tlung be. Thlawpaw tah a pipaw cawh ma hraco aa cang,” tatah a tah.
“Ma hapaw cawh zekhatamaw a cang thai a?” tatah Nikodema taco a hae hri kaw.
Zisu taco, “Israel cawngsaw sahlo cawngpahtu a cangpaw tah ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh hnih thai bei ceh maw?
Biahmuisui ka ca ching, hnih peh ka, kaa rei, kaa hmuhpaw kong khah kaa rei lai, canghrasala kaa reipaw khah naaning tah zing tlung bei he ceh.
Aluicung hming kong ka reipaw hmai naa zing tlung be, vaicung lang kong sahlo cawh ca ching my he neh seh la, zekhatamaw naa zing khy thai a?
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw, vaicung taitei a vongpaw cy tah ly co ahohmai tah vaicung lang aa ke bang tlung be.
Moses tei raangcaa letah daa pari a caliapaw hratah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh calia a cang hrá a.
Macawtaco Ama a zingpaw maikaw cawh chaizaw tah a hring he a.
Khazing tah khazaw heh a do ngeteinah cawtah a Sawcapaw hnuitlakangpaw khah a peh. Ahohmai a zingpaw maikaw cawh lyde lytah chaizaw hringnah aa hnui a.
Khazaw heh thaily cang sá pawtah Khazing tah a Sawcapaw cawh a tawpaw cang be, Ama a thongtah pachah aa cang khy nápawtah a tawpaw khah a cang hri.
Ama a zingpaw maikaw cawh thaily cangsah cang a bei he. Canghrasala a zing lypaw maikaw cawh ato lalei hei thaily a cang thah he, Khazing Sawcapaw hnuitlakangpaw ming aa zing lynah cawtah a cang.
Ma heh thaily cangnah cawh a cang. Akhaipaw cawh khazaw lehei a vong ka, canghrasala cawngsaw tah a khaipaw navy tah a muipaw aa tlechai vy, zecawtamaw tatah aa hming tuapaw sahlo khah a chahlynah cawtah a cang.
Ahohmai hmingchaw ly a tuapaw maikaw taco akhaipaw a hua he, taico akhaipaw lang zong a vong du bei he, hmingchaw ly aa tuapaw khah akhaipaw letah a langpang le tahpaw aa cinah cawtah a cang.
Canghrasala biahmuisui letei a hringpaw taco akhaipaw lang cawh a vong he. Aa tuapaw hming vytei khah Khazing thongtah aa tuapaw a cang tahpaw khah a lang pase khy nápawtah,” tatah a tah.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah Judia raang khuatei lang khah sei he ka, ma letaco zemaw cai hrawng ung ka, baptisma zong a cangsah he.
Mataico, Johan zong tah Salim khua kae Ainon aa tahpaw letaco baptisma cangsah he ka, cawngsaw hlupui tah ama khatah baptisma cang rua pawtah aa pange. Zecawtamaw tatah ma leco tui ahlunah cawtah a cang.
Ma heh Johan cawh thong letah a tlah hlai tah a cang.
Johan hning a zuipaw sahlo thaikhehpaw le Juda cawngsaw pakheh cawh a sipathainah phung le lang kong letah bia a ei he.
Johan khaco a vong he ka, a hai leco, “Cawngpahtu, Jordan tuivaw rae lang letei nama khatah a ungpaw, a konglang na reilaipaw takhei baptisma cangsah he ka, cawngsaw hlupui tah aa pange,” tatah aa ching.
Johan taco, ma hrahei a palei he, “Vaicung taitah pehpaw suipaw khah cawngsaw taco a hnui khypaw a cang.
Kama cawh, ‘Khri cang bei neh, zua a ky ruapaw tei a hmelang a seilai ruapaw tah tawpaw ka cang,’ ka tahpaw khah naaning sahlo ceingei tah naa hni.
Myno cawh my a hnuitupaw cawtah a cang. My a hnuitupaw a vesaw a cangpaw taco ama cawh heh thlang ka, a naw thlia paria thlang. My hnuitu o cawh a thui tih letaco a thaw a chah ngetei. Ma a lawngnah cawh kama ka cawtah cang ka, atoheh a va tlung thah hi.
Ama cawh a laisui ruapaw a cang, kama cawh a zochuh ruapaw ka cang.
Cung lang taitah a va chuhpaw cawh ming vytei cung letei a ungpaw a cang, aluicung taitei a chuhpaw cawh alui cawngsaw cang ka, aluicung kong khah a rei. Avai taitei a va chuhpaw cawh ming vytei cung letei a ungpaw cawh a cang.
A hmuhpaw le a thuipaw khah a thuisah he, canghrasala a thui sahpaw he bia cawh ahotahmai nge bei he.
A bia a ngepaw taco Khazing cawh a ding hmuisui tahpaw khah a pacysah.
Khazing tawpaw a cangpaw taco Khazing bia khah a rei. Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing taco ama cawh a Thlawpaw khah ri tai ung lytah a peh.
Paw tah Sawcapaw khah a do, zezong vytei khah a kih letah a chia.
Sawcapaw a zingpaw maikaw taco chaizaw hringnah aa hnui. Sawcapaw a pawng lypaw maikaw taco hringnah hnui bei he, Khazing thingaenah khah aa cung letah a ung hri a,” tatah a tah.
Farasi sahlo taco Zisu tah Johan navy tah hningzuitu hlu vy a hnuipaw le ming hlu vy baptisma a cangsah paw he khah aa thui.
Zisu ceingei tah baptisma cawh a cangsah bei he, a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa cangsah he.
Ma kong cawh Abuipaw tah thui ka, Judia raang cawh piasai ka, Galili raang lang khah a sei kaw.
Samaria raang cahrong tah sei pawtah cang ka,
Samaria raang khua, Saikar aa tahpaw cawh va phah ka, ma cawh Jakob tei a sawcapaw Josef a pehpaw hminghmaw kae leteipaw khah a cang.
Ma leco Jakob tei tuikho a copaw cawh a ung. Zisu cawh khuatlongnah langpui letei a va sei lainah letaco a thaw bang ka, ma tuikho kae letaco a ty ka, a hia. Ma cawh ningching hrawng letah a cang.
Taico Samaria cawngsawno pakheh cawh ma tuikho letei tui cawh thai rua pawtah va chuh ka, Zisu tah a hai leco, “Tui ding ruapaw pa pei khy ceh maw?” tatah a tah.
A hningzuitu sahlo khah khuachung lang e ruapaw cawh tah a sei thah he.
Samaria cawngsawno taco, “Nama cawh Juda mingphing cang ceh ka, kama cawh Samaria mingphing cang neh ka, zekhatah zia tamaw tui ding ruapaw na pa hae thlang?” a tah. Juda mingphing sahlo cawh Samaria mingphing khatah a pahlawh bei he.
Zisu taco a hai letah, “Khazing lahsong le nama khatei tui ding ruapaw a ca haepaw heh cawh hnih tua la, nama tah ama khatah tui ding ruapaw na hae hri ruapaw a cang; taico ama tah hringnah tui cawh a ca pae a,” tatah a tah.
Canuno taco, “Ka pu, ma tuikho heh a thuh ngeteipaw tah cang ka, tuithai nápaw zehmai na hnui tlung be. Zekhatamaw hringnah tui cawh na hmuh khy thai zia a?
Kaa mapaw Jakob navy tah na rungnaw vy maw? Ama taco ma tuikho heh ama le a sawtei leh vytei le, aa sahring zuapaw vytei, ding ruapaw tah a ma pehpaw a cang hi,” a tah.
Zisu tah ma hrahei a chai, “Ma tui a dingpaw maikaw heh cawh aa tui a hrae kaw a.
Canghrasala kama tei ka pehpaw tui a dingpaw maikaw he cawh aa tui hrae khaw be. Ka pehpaw he tui cawh aa chung taitah tuihnaw hratah a laichua a, chaizaw hringnah tai a lai a,” tatah a tah.
Canuno taco, “Ka pu, ma tui cawh pa pei tua, ka tui a hrae khawh ly nápawtah le ma tuikho lehei tui ka va thai khawh ly nápawtah,” a tah.
Canuno cawh, “Va sei la, na pasae va y la, a vong kaw my lo,” tatah a tah.
Canuno taco, “Pasae ka hnui tlung be” tatah a palei. Zisu tah a hai letah, “Pasae hnui bei neh, na tahpaw heh biahmuisui a cang.
Hmuisui teico, pasae papangaw na hnui thah, atotei na ung hruipaw cawngsaw zong heh na pasae hmuisui cawh cang hlui be, na reipaw heh biadih a cang,” tatah a tah.
Canuno taco, “Ka pu, nama heh Khazing khuavang na cang tahpaw ka hni,
aa ma pathlahtu sahlo tah ma tlaang lehei Khazing aa beh tei. Canghrasala naaning Juda mingphing sahlo taco Jerusalem letah Khazing cawh beh rua a cang tatah naa tah,” a tah.
Taico Zisu tah a hai letah, “Canuno, ka bia heh zing tua, a cai le ning a va tlung leimei, ma tlaang lehei a cang ly leh Jerusalem letah cang lytah Paw Khazing aa behnah cai khah a tlung a.
Naaning Samaria mingphing taco naa hni lypaw khah naa beh tei, pachahnah cawh Juda mingphing taitah a va chuhpaw a cangnah cawtah kaaning taco kaa behpaw khah kaa hni.
Paw cawh a beh hmuisuipaw sahlo tah Thlawpaw le biahmuisui tei aa beh nápaw cai cawh a va chuh myca, atoheh a va phah thah. Ma hapaw cawngsaw cawh Paw tah a huipaw a cang he.
Khazing cawh Thlawpaw cang ka ama a behpaw sahlo taco thlawpaw le biahmuisui tah aa beh hrahring ruapaw a cang,” tatah a tah.
Canuno taco a hai letah, “Mesiah (ma cawh, ‘Khri,’ tahnah a cang) a va chuh tae a tahpaw ka hni. Ama cawh a va chua tihtah hming silang vytei khah a ma chingpase tae a,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah a hai letaco, “Nama kha bia a rei leimeipaw heh Ama cawh ka cang,” tatah a tah.
A hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa va tlung kaw tihtah Zisu cawh canuno khatei bia aa reihrui leimeipaw khah hmuh he ka, aa ning a ang thlang. Canghrasala ahotahmai tah, “Zemaw ma canuno khakhei na hiapaw a ung? Ze kong maw naa reihrui leimei?” tatah hae hri bei he.
Taico canuno cawh a tuibei khah seisai ka, khuachung lang khah va sei ka, khuasaw sahlo hai letaco,
“A vong la, va ming tua o, ka tuasenah maikaw a pa ching thlu khypaw cawngsaw pakheh a ung, Khri a cang khy mai!” a tah he.
Khuachung letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh ka piathlah he ka, Zisu ungnah lang aa va pange.
Ma chung taco a hningzuitu sahlo tah, “Cawngpahtu, sangkheh kheh e taw,” tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala Zisu taco aa hai letah, “A kong naa hni lypaw e ruapaw batui ka hnui,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aaning le aaning khah, “Batui a va peipaw ung ta he maw!” tatah a tah he.
Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Ka batui cawh a pa tawtu a dunah tua le a rai patlung patlia khah a cang.
‘Thlah pali khy taico saze hre a cang a,’ tah tei bei he ceh maw? Ka ca ching he hi, naa meh duichy la, saze ly khah mingtua o! Hre rua pawtah a zaw thlu myca he khi.
Saze a hrepaw tah a hrenah mai cawh a hmuh tei. Chaizaw hringnah caw pawtah aa hre myca. Ma pawsui co, saze a lingpaw le a hrepaw cawh a lawng hrui khy he a.
Ma tih taco, ‘Pakhehpaw tah ling ka, pakhehpaw tah a hre,’ tahpaw cawh ahmang a.
Naa ling lypaw saze hre rua pawtah ka ca taw he hi. Ming hringpaw sahlo tah raisah cawh hre he ka, aa raihrenah a thuipa cawh naaning tah naa hria,” a tah he.
Saikar khuachung letei a ungpaw Samaria cawngsaw a hlupui tah canuno tei, “Ka hming tua ciapaw vytei a pa ching khy thlu,” a tahpaw rawng takhei Ama cawh aa zing.
Macawtaco, Samaria cawngsaw sahlo cawh Ama khaco a vong he ka, kaaning kha caang cong thlang tatah thly he ka, ninghning aaning khatah a caang.
Taico, a cawngpahnah bia thong khei, mehlupui tah Ama cawh aa zing.
Canuno hai letaco, “Nama tei na reinah thongtah kaa zingpaw cang lytah kaaning ceingei tah thui peh ka, ma paw cawngsaw heh khazaw Pachahtu hmuisui a cang tahpaw kaa hninah cawtah a cang,” tatah aa tah.
Ninghning khy tah ma khua taico piathlah ka, Galili raang lang a sei.
Zisu tah, “Khazing khuavang cawh ama a khua le raang letaco pasung panawnah a tong be,” tahpaw bia khah a rei.
Canghrasala Galili raang cawh a va phah tihtah Galili cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu cawh aa cyhlang. Khungsai Panawnah ning tei Jerusalem khua letah a tuapaw vytei khah aa hmuh, zecawtamaw tatah ma lekhei a ung thlang hrah he.
Zisu cawh tui misurhang tei a cangsahnah hminghmaw, Galili raang letei Kana khua lang khah a va sei kaw. Ma leco abui pakheh a cangpaw a sawcapaw, Kapernaum khua letah a ungpaw cawh dang be.
Ma cawngsawpaw taco Zisu cawh Judia raang taitah Galili raang a va phah tahpaw khah a thui tihtah ama khaco a vaw ka, a thi daimangpaw a sawcapaw cawh dang sá pawtah a vong theh ky law tatah a va naw.
Zisu tah ma cawngsawpaw hai letah, “Naaning sahlo taco ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah le khuarawha a chuipaw naa hmuh tah lypaw co zing by bei ceh,” tatah a tah.
Ma abuipaw taco, “Abuipaw, ka sawcapaw a thih hlai lehei a vong theh ky,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Va sei thlang, na sawcapaw cawh a hring a,” tatah a palei. Ma cawngsaw taco Zisu tei a hai letah bia a reipaw cawh zing ka, a sei hly.
Lang letah a seilai leimeining taco, a sae sahlo tah va dai he ka, na sawcapaw a dang thah tahpaw aa thuisah.
A sawcapaw cawh zening cai hrawng taikhei maw a chah vy longmang tahpaw khah a hae tih he tah a hai leco, “Ziachaning, zailang suimehlang pakheh hrong taikhei a thlasih taco a thlaw,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico a paw taco, ma cawh Zisu tei, “Na sawcapaw cawh a hring a,” tatei a chingpaw cai a cang hrahring takhah a hni. Macawtaco ama le a ingchungkho vytei tah aa zing.
Ma heh Judia raang taitah Galili raang a va phah khy taitei Zisu tah a tuapaw a uihningnah ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a cang.
Cai a cawngpe khy tai khei Juda cawngsaw sahlo Panawnah letah a hlo hra pawtah Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang khah a kechy.
Jerusalem khuapui letei Tuu Hawkaw aa tahpaw kae letaco, tuiching, Aramaik rei tah Bethesda aa tahpaw ung ka, dungkalung sangpangaw a hnui.
Ma letaco mehdang ly hlupui, mehco le a songbepaw, a kih le phe a ngawpaw sahlo vytei taco, tui a calawh lepaw khah aa haw thlang.
Ma tuiching cawh vaiming sahlo tah a calawhsah tei he ka, ma tui a calawh ning tei a chunglang a zythlah tawpaw he cawh zehapaw a sawnah a cangpaw hmai tah dangnah aa hmuh tei.
Ma leco cawngsaw pakheh a dang lypaw kung songthung leh kung reh a sah ciapaw a ung.
Zisu tah ma cawngsaw cawh hmuh ka, ma leco khua sypui dang lytah a ung myca tahpaw khah hnih ka, a hai letah “Dang na du maw?” tatah a tah.
Mehdang ly taco, “Abuipaw, ma tui heh a calawh cangkawleh tui chunglang a pa nong ruapaw ahohmai ung bei he. A nawng pawtah ka seining maikaw tah cawngsaw ahringpaw tah aa pa chokhai thah leimei thlang,” tatah a palei.
Zisu taco a hai letah, “Tho la, na iphaw a lah la, sei,” tatah a tah.
Sung sungkheh tah ma cawngsaw cawh dang ka, a iphaw cawh law ka, a sei. Ma ning cawh Sabat ning a cang.
Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco, “Atoning heh Sabat ning cang ka, na iphaw law khy bei ceh, a phung cang be,” tatah aa tah.
Ama taco aa hai letah, “A pa dangsah tupaw tah, ‘Na iphaw law la, sei law,’ a pa tah,” tatah a tah he.
Aaning sahlo taco, “Na iphaw law la, sei a ca tahpaw cawh ahomaw?” tatah aa hae.
Dangsah a cangpaw cawngsawpaw taco a dangsah tupaw khah hnih pase be, zecawtamaw tatah Zisu cawh ma leteipaw zawpui hrong taico a seihly.
A hning khy tah ma cawngsawpaw khah Zisu tah behnah ing letah hmuh ka, “Na dang myca hi, atohei co suanah va tua khawh kheh, na tua vy caco a sah vy tah maw na cung letah tlung pang le,” tatah a tah.
Cawngsawpaw cawh seihly ka, a dangsahtu khah Zisu a cang tahpaw cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo khah a ching he.
Macawtaco Zisu tah ma hming sahlo cawh Sabat ning tah a tuanah cawtah Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco Ama cawh ruhanah aa peh.
Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Ka Paw tah atoning tai a rai hre ka, kama zong ka hre hrápaw a cang,” a tah he.
Ma rawng tahei Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco thaw rua pawtah khei a zawng tima he; Sabat ning a ronah caw tahei long cang lytah Khazing khah Ama a Paw tatah a y cawtah le Khazing kha a khing pawtah a tuanah cawtah a cang.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Sawcapaw tahei ama teitah zehmai tua khy be, Paw tei a tuapaw a hmuhpaw longlong khah a tua khy, zecawtamaw tatah Paw tei a tuapaw maikaw khah Sawcapaw zong tah a tua hrah.
Zecawtamaw tatah Paw taco Sawcapaw khah do ka, a tuapaw vytei khah a hmuhsah. Naa ningangnah rua pawtah ma sahlo navy hei a rungnaw vypaw hming sahlo a hmuh sá a.
Zecawtamaw tatah Paw tah mehthi patho he ka, hringnah a pehpaw he hratah Sawcapaw zong tah peh a dupaw khah hringnah cawh a peh hrah he.
Ma hlui co, Paw tah ahohmai biacepah bei he, canghrasala biacenah vytei khah Sawcapaw letah a peh thah,
ma cawh Paw aa cizawpaw hratah Sawcapaw aa cizaw khy nápaw cawtah a cang. Sawcapaw a cizaw lypaw taco ama a za tawpaw Paw khah cizaw hrah be.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Ka bia thui katei, a pa tawtupaw a zingpaw cawngsaw cawh chaizaw hringnah hnui ka, sua phosah cang a be. Ama cawh thihnah taitah hringnah lang khah a palang thah.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, mehthi tah Khazing Sawcapaw a o thui he ka, a thuipaw sahlo taco hringnah aa hmuh nápaw cai cawh va chuh leimei ka, atoheh a va phah myca.
Zecawtamaw tatah Paw cawh Ama teitah hringnah a hnuipaw hratah, a Sawcapaw khah Ama teitah hringnah hnuinah naw a peh.
Taico Ama cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a cangnah cawtah biacenah nawhnuinah zong khah a peh.
Ma heh naa ningang kheh seh, zecawtamaw tatah athlai letei a ungpaw vytei tah a o thui a he ka,
aa tho nápaw cai cawh a va chuh leimei myca. Chahnah a tuapaw sahlo cawh hringnah letah tho a he ka, chianah a tuapaw sahlo cawh thaily cang rua pawtah a tho he a.
Kama cawh ka naw tah zehmai tua khy bei neh. Ka thuipaw hratah biace neh ka, ka biacepaw cawh a ding, zecawtamaw tatah kama ka dunah zui lytah a pa tawtupaw a dunah ka zuinah cawtah a cang.
Kama ka kong kama tah ka reilai caco, ka reipaw cawh zingchui be.
Kama ka kong a reipaw pakheh ung ka, ama tei ka kong a reipaw cawh zing a chui tah khah ka hni.
Naaning tah Johan khakhei cawngsaw taw he ceh ka, ama taco biahmuisui khah a rei.
Mehnung tei ka kong aa reipaw cawh zetah sah bei neh. Canghrasala ma bia ka reipaw heh pachah naa cang khy nápawtah a cang.
Johan cawh a khai ngeteipaw me-ing cang ka, naaning taco ama a khainah cawh caikheh tei anawngnah takhei naa du.
Johan a reipaw navy tah a rungnaw vypaw khah kama cawh ka reipaw a cang. Zecawtamaw tatah atotei rai heh paling rua pawtah hei Paw tah pa pei ka, taico ma ka hre leimeipaw rai tahei kama cawh Paw tah a pa taw tahpaw khah a langsah.
Taico a pa tawtupaw Paw ceingei tah ka cangnah konglang cawh a langsah. Naaning taco a o thui bang be ca he ceh ka, a hmui zong hmuh bang bei he ceh.
A bia zong naaning letah a cingkai bei he ceh, zecawtamaw tatah a tawpaw khah naa zing lynah cawtah.
Khazing Capathai khah khiahle he ceh ka naa rei, zecawtamaw tatah ma sahlo taikhei chaizaw hringnah kaa hmuh khy a tah naa rawh cawtah a cang. Ma Capathai sahlo heh kama ka kong a langsahpaw a cang he.
Canghrasala hringnah hnui rua pawtah kama kha a vong cawh du hlui bei he ceh.
Cawngsaw tei pachaw palaw cawh du bei neh,
canghrasala ka ca hni thlang he. Naa thinglung letah Khazing donah hnui bei he ceh tah cawh ka hni.
Kama cawh ka Paw a ming tah a vong neh ka, naaning tah pa cyhlang bei he ceh, canghrasala pakheh kheh cawh Ama a ming tah a vong tua my seh la, ama cawh naa cyhlang thlang a.
Pakheh le pakheh na reithainah pawhe ceh cawh a cyhlang he ceh ka, Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw reithainah zetah a rei lypaw naaning sahlo tahei zekhatamaw naa zing khy a?
Canghrasala Paw hmekaw letah sua a ma phosá a tatah parawh khe o, naaning sua a ca pho sápaw he cawh na paichai pawhe ceh Moses khah a cang.
Moses naa zing caco, kama naa pa zing rua a cang, zecawtamaw tatah ama taco kama ka kong a ciapaw a cang.
Canghrasala a ciapaw naa zing lynah cawtah khei ka reipaw cawh zekhatamaw naa zing khy thai a?” tatah a tah.
Ma khy taico, Zisu cawh Galili rili (ma heh Tiberia rili a cang) ngaekang lang khah a vaw ka,
cawngsaw rungpui takhei Ama cawh aa zui, zecawtamaw tatah a sahpaw sahlo cung letei a tuapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah khah aa hmuh cawtah a cang.
Mataico Zisu cawh tlanglang ke ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei a ty.
Juda cawngsaw aa Khungsai Panawnah cawh a ne myca.
Zisu cawh a hui ka, Ama lang cawngsaw rungpui a vongpaw he khah a hmuh tihtah Filip hai leco, “Ma cawngsaw sahlo aa e rua tahei zeletamaw very kaa va caw a?” tatah a tah.
Ama hnehsah nápawtah ma bia heh a haepaw a cang, zecawtamaw tatah zemaw ka tua a tahpaw khah a lung letah a hni pacia thah.
Filip taco a hai letah, “Pakheh tah sangkheh cy ting rua pawtah a zawpaw very cawh thlah reh nihlo tah a cawh khy tlung be!” tatah a chai.
Ahringpaw a hningzuitu, Simon Piter a unypaw Andru taco,
“Ma lehei hrangsang very tlangpangaw le ngadih punghning a hnuipaw nyhehpaw a ung, canghrasala ma reiropaw cawngsaw hrong lehei zetlang maw a cang a?” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Cawngsaw khah a tysah tua o,” tatah a tah he. Ma hminghmaw cawh araang hrong tah cang ka, capaw puitling 5000 hrong a cangpaw he cawh a ty he.
Mataico Zisu tah very tlang sahlo cawh law ka, Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai ka, a ty thlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa dunah zé khei rai law a tah he. Ngaw zong cawh ma hraco a tua.
Aa rivaw pawtah aa e thlu khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Ebangpaw very sahlo pahmo la, thlaw thlang khe lo,” a tah he.
Ma sahlo tei aa ebangpaw very tlang pangaw taitei a hluipaw sahlo cawh pakhong he ka, baihraw hluihning a chih.
Cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu tei a tuapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah khah aa hmuh tihtah, “Ma paw heh khazaw letah a vongpaw Khazing khuavang a cang hrahring,” tatah aa tah.
Ma sahlo tahei a vong he ka, hranghrang tah siangpahrang tah aa pa tua a tahpaw khah a hninah cawtah tlanglang khah aparuh teitah a seihly kaw.
Zailang a va phah tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Galili tuiping lang khah cung thlah he ka,
tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae he ka, Kapernaum khua lang sei rua pawtah khei tuiping cawh aa cakah. Khua cawh mui ca ka, Zisu cawh aaning sahlo khah a hlawng balang bei he.
Thli a rupaw pui a hrang ka, tuileh cawh a cahrah ngetei.
Khangthung a cang ly leh khangpali hrawng tuilawng cawh aa zei taitah tui cung letah Zisu va sei katei, tuilawng a va pangepaw khah hmuh he ka, aa ci a tho.
Canghrasala Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Kama ka cang hi, ci khe o,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico tuilawng chunglang cawh a naesah he ka, ma cangkawleh cawh tuilawng cawh aa tingnahpaw ngaekang khah a va phah.
Ningthlamongpaw cawh a hningzuitu sahlo aa ungnahpaw dihdong tuiping raechai ngaekang letei a ungpaw zawpui sahlo tah ma lekhei a hningzuitu sahlo aa kepaw tuilawng sangkheh suitei ung ka, Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei tuilawng chunglang a nae be, aaning teitah aa seihly tahpaw khah aa hni.
Mataico, Tiberia khuapui taitah a va chuhpaw tuilawng sahlo cawh cawngsaw rungpui tah Abuipaw tei lawngbia a hlai khy taitah very aa enah hminghmaw lekhei aa chung he.
Ma hminghmaw leco Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo ung bei he tahpaw khah zawpuipaw tah aa hni tihtah tuilawng cawh ke he ka, Zisu hui rua pawtah khei Kapernaum khua lang cawh aa sei.
Tuiping raechai lang lekhei aa va hmuh tihtah a hai leco, “Cawngpahtu, zening tamaw ma lang heh na va sei?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Kama naa pa hui lai leimeipaw heh ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah naa hmuh cawtah cang lytah naa ri vaw ky tah very tlang sahlo khah naa e rawng tah a cang.
A lyde khypaw ding le e caw suipaw tah rai hre khe o, chaizaw hringnah khatei a peitlepaw batui, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tei a ca pehpaw he cawtah khei naa hre hri be. Ama cawh Paw Khazing tah a nawtlahnah ca a khai ciapaw a cang!” tatah a chai he.
Mataico Zisu cawh, “Khazing a dupaw rai kaa hre khy nápawtah zemaw kaa tua ruapaw a cang?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Khazing rai cawh ma heh a cang hi, Ama tei a za tawpaw zing khah a cang,” tatah a chai he.
Macawtaco Zisu cawh, “Hmuh a tei kaa ca zing nápawtah ze ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah maw na ma pae a? Zemaw na tua a?
‘Aaning sahlo aa e ruapaw takhei very khah avai taitah a thlah he,’ tatah ciapaw hratah kaa mapaw sahlo taco raangcaa lekhei manna very khah aa e tatah,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, vaicung taitei very a thlah pahpaw he khah Moses cang be, vaicung taitah very hmuisuipaw a ca thlah pawhe cawh ka Paw a cang hri.
Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing very cawh vaicung taitah za cung katei, khazaw caw tei hringnah a peipaw cawngsawpaw heh a cang,” tatah a tah he.
Aaning sahlo taco, “Abuipaw, ma very cawh atohei co ma pei tei my lo,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico Zisu tah, “Kama heh hringnah very cawh ka cang hi. Kama khatei a vongpaw cawngsaw cawh a ngaidi by be, taico kama a pa zingpaw cawngsaw cawh zening tahmai a tui hrae by be.
Canghrasala ka rei ciapaw hratah, naa pa hmuh thlang naná teitah pa zing hlui bei he ceh.
Paw tei a pa pehpaw vytei sahlo cawh kama khatah a vong he ka, kama khatah a vongpaw maikaw cawh ahohmai daichua bei neh.
Zecawtamaw tatah kama ka dunah tua rua pawtah vaicung taitah za cung be ca neh ka, a pa tawpaw a dunah tua rua pawtah a cang hri.
Taico a pa tawpaw a dunah cawh kama a pa pehpaw vytei sahlo khah pakheh hmai hly lytah caichangnah ning letah tho sápaw he khah a cang.
Zecawtamaw tatah ka Paw a dunah cawh Sawcapaw khah hmuh katei, a zingpaw taco chaizaw hringnah hnui ka, caidongnah ning letah kama tah ka patho a,” tahpaw heh a cang.
“Kama heh vaicung taitei a za cungpaw very cawh ka cang,” a tah cawtah Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei a kong phingze hrang khah patho he ka,
“Ma paw heh Zisu, Josef a sawcapaw khah cang bei maw, a no le a paw kaa hni thlangpaw he khah? Zecawtamaw, ‘Vaicung taitah ka za cung tatah a tah lalei?’ ” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Naaning le naaning teitah phingze leimei khawh khe o.
A pa tawpaw Paw tah a va chui he tah ly co kama kha a vong khypaw ahohmai ung bei he, a vongpaw cawh caichangnah ning letah ka patho a.
Khazing khuavang sahlo cabu letah, ‘Aaning vytei cawh Khazing tah a cawngpah he a,’ tatah ciapaw a cang. Paw bia nge katei a cawngpaw maikaw he cawh kama kha a vong tae he a.
Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw seh tah ly co Paw a hmuhpaw ung bei he, Ama suitei heh Paw a hmuhpaw cawh a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ahohmai a zingpaw maikaw taco chaizaw hringnah a hnui thah.
Kama heh hringnah very cawh ka cang.
Naa mapaw sahlo taco raangcaa letah manna very khah e he ka, a thi thlang he.
Canghrasala vaicung taitah a za cungpaw very ung ka, ma a epaw cawngsaw cawh thi a bei he.
Kama heh vaicung taitei a za cungpaw hringnah very cawh ka cang. Cawngsaw ahotahmai ma very heh a e caco, ama cawh chaizaw tah a hring a. Ma very cawh khazaw hring ná pawtei ka paepaw ka ngaisaw heh a cang,” tatah a chai he.
Mataico, “Ma cawngsaw tahei zekhatamaw kaa e ruapaw tah a ngaisaw cawh a ma peh thai a?” tatah Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh lesahtei tah a eichae he.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a ngaisaw naa e ly le a thisai naa ding ly caco, hringnah hnui bei ceh.
Ka ngaisaw e katei, ka thisai a dingpaw taco chaizaw hringnah hnui a ka, caichangnah ning letah ka patho a.
Zecawtamaw tatah ka ngaisaw cawh batui hmuisui cang ka, ka thisai cawh ding hmuisui ruapaw a cang.
Ka ngaisaw e katei, ka thisai a dingpaw cawh kama letah ung ka, ama letah kama zong ka ung hrah.
A hring thlangpaw Paw tah pa taw ka, Paw thongtah ka hringpaw hratah Ka ngaisaw e katei ka thisai a dingpaw cawh kama ka thongtah ama zong a hring a.
Ma heh vaicung taitei a za cungpaw very cawh a cang. Kaa mapaw sahlo cawh manna very khah e he ka, a thi he, canghrasala ma very a epaw heh cawh chaizaw tah a hring a,” tatah a tah.
Ma bia heh Kapernaum khua synagog letah a cawngpah ning he tah a reipaw a cang.
Ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah a hningzuitu mehlupui takhei, “A cawngpahnah a ru ngetei. Ahomaw a cyhlang khy a?” tatah aa tah.
Ma kong a reipaw rawng tei a hningzuitu sahlo aa phingzepaw khah Zisu tah hnih ka, aa hai leco, “Ma bia takhei naa lung ca cangsah bei he i?
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a ungnah tawpaw lang a ke kawpaw khah hmuh my la, zekhatamaw naa ta a!
Hringnah a peipaw cawh Thlawpaw heh a cang, ngaisawpaw cawh zehmai cang be. Naaning khatei ka reipaw bia sahlo heh thlawpaw cawh cang ka, hringnah a cang he.
Canghrasala, naaning thaikhehpaw sahlo taco zing bei he ceh,” tatah a tah he. Zecawtamaw tatah ahomaw a zing lypaw tahpaw le ahomaw a pa luithae a tahpaw khah a thoning taitah Zisu tah a hni thah cawtah a cang.
A bia reipaw cawh pazo ka, “Ma cawtah hei Paw tah a baw ly caco he kama kha a vong khypaw ung bei he tatah ka tahpaw khah a cang,” tatah a tah.
Ma khy cangkaw leco, a hningzuitu mehlupui khah a paleh kaw he ka, Ama khah zui khawh bei he.
Macawtaco Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning sahlo khah, “Naaning saw, seihly cawh naa du hrah maw, du hrah ly?” tatah a hae he.
Simon Piter tah, “Abuipaw, aho kha maw kaa sei a? Chaizaw hringnah bia a hnuipaw cawh nama na cang.
Nama cawh Khazing a Mehpathai na cang tahpaw hnih peh ka, kaa zing myca,” tatah a chai.
Mataico Zisu tah, “Naaning hluihningpaw heh kama tah ka ca thingpaw cang bei he ceh maw? Canghrasala naaning hrong lehei pakheh cawh khachia a cang!” tatah a palei.
Ma cawh hluihning letei reipaipaw, a hning tah Ama a luithepaw Simon Iskariot a sawcapaw Judas Iskariot khah a tah hnangpaw a cang.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh Galili pai chung khah a tlawng lai, Judia raang taitah a nocareipaw a cang, zecawtamaw tatah Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei kaa thaw a tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala Juda cawngsaw sahlo Thlangda Panaw khah a ne tihtah,
a uny sahlo takhei Zisu cawh, “Na hningzuitu sahlo tah ningang chuipaw na tuapaw sahlo khah hmuh na he seh tatah ma taihei piathlah la, Judia raang lang na sei be.
Cawngsaw tah pa hnih he seh tah a dupaw taco aparuh teitah zehmai tua bang bei he. Ma hming sahlo na tuapaw hei khazaw cawh a hnisah ca,” tatah aa tah.
Zecawtamaw tatah a chuahrui uny sahlo takhei hmai tah Ama cawh zing bei he.
Macawtaco Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh, “Ka cawtah cai rawhpaw tlung balang be; naaning naa caw taco ze cai hmai heh a rai cang thlang.
Khazaw tahei naaning cawh a ca hua bei he, canghrasala kama cawh a pa hua, zecawtamaw tatah a tuapaw khah hmingchahly a cang tatah ka tah cawtah a cang.
Panawnah lang cawh va sei la, kama cawh va sei balang bei neh, zecawtamaw tatah ka cawtah cai tlung balang be,” tatah a ching he.
Ma bia a rei khy taico, Galili pai chung lekhei a ung thlang.
Canghrasala a uny sahlo cawh Panawnah zo pawtah aa seithlah khy taikhei Ama zong cawh langhai tah cang lytah aparuh teitah a sei hrah.
Panawnah leco Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei hui he ka, “Ma cawngsawpaw khah zeletamaw a ung?” tatah aa hae lai he.
Zawpuipaw taco a konglang cawh a cekanawh tlungmang he. Thaikhehpaw tah, “Mehchaw a cang,” tatah aa tah. Ahringpaw tah, “Cang be, cawngsaw a dungkhei laipaw a cang,” tatah aa palei he.
Canghrasala Juda cawngsaw khah aa cinah caw he tah ahotahmai a kong khah langhai tah zehmai rei bei he.
Panawnah cawh a cing chy tluh aa pachang hrawnghrang lekhei Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang khah va sei ka, a cawngpah he.
Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa khuarawh haa ka, “Ma cawngsawpaw tahei cawngnah hnui lytah zekhatamaw ma hrahei a hni thlang?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Ka cawngpahnah heh kama taiteipaw cang be. A pa taw tupaw taitei a va chuhpaw a cang.
Khazing dunah tua a pachiapaw cawngsaw taco ka cawngpahnah heh Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw maw a cang, a cang ly leh kama taiteipaw maw a cang tah cawh a hni thlang a.
Ama dunah hratah male a cawngpahpaw cawh ama ming chahnah a huipaw a cang. Canghrasala ama a taw tupaw ming chah nápaw caw tei a hrepaw cawngsaw cawh zingchuipaw cawngsaw a cang; a chung letah hinghenah hnui be.
Phungbia khah Moses tah ca pei bei he maw? Pakheh tahmai tah naa zui tlung be. Zecawtamaw thaw na pa pachia he ceh?” tatah a tah he.
Cawngsaw zawpui taco, “Nama cawh khachia tah a pahrangpaw na cang. Ahomaw thaw a ca pachia?” tatah aa chai.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Ningang chuipaw sangkheh ka tuapaw khah naa zongmingtei tah naa khuarawh a haa.
Moses tah cingpatainah phung a ca peh caw he tah Sabat ning tahmai nyheh khah aa cingpa naa tai he kho. A ngetei tahpaw co, ma cawh Moses taitah a chuhpaw cang lytah naa pu naa paw sahlo taitah a chuhpaw a cang kho.
Moses phungbia khah ro tlung lytah nyheh khah Sabat ning tah aa cingpa naa tai he a cang caco, zecawtamaw Sabat ning tah cawngsaw pakheh ka dangsahnah rawng letah ka cung letah naa thing a ae?
A cungphai a langná tah biacepah khe la, a dingpaw teitah biace my lo,” tatah a tah he.
Ma bia rawng taco Jerusalem khuapui letei a ungpaw cawngsaw thaikhehpaw sahlo tah, “Ma paw heh thaw a pachiapaw he khah cang bei maw?
Ma lehei a langhai tah bia rei ka, zekhatahmai aa tah tlung be. Nawhnuitu sahlo tahei Khri cawh ama heh a cang tahpaw hnih pase ta he maw?
Canghrasala kaaning sahlo taco ma cawngsawpaw heh zelang tah a va chuhpaw maw a cang tah hnih thlang tlung peh ka, canghrasala Khri a va chua tih taco zelang tamaw a va chua a tahpaw ahotahmai aa hni tlung be,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico, Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chung letei a cawngpahnah pawhe leco a thangpui tah y ka, “A cang, pa hnih he ceh ka, zelang tah a va chuhpaw maw ka cang tahpaw zong naa hni. Kama ka rei tah ma lehei a vong bei neh, canghrasala a pa tawtupaw cawh ahmangpaw a cang. Naaning taco Ama cawh hnih bei he ceh,
canghrasala kama taco Ama cawh ka hni, zecawtamaw tatah Kama cawh Ama taiteipaw cang neh ka, Ama tah a pa taw,” tatah a tah.
Ma leco tle a pachia he, canghrasala ahotahmai a cung letah aa kih thlah bei he, zecawtamaw tatah a cai khah tlung balang be.
Cawngsaw zawpui chung letei mehlupui takhei Ama cawh aa zing. “Khri a va chua tihtah ma cawngsawpaw navy hei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a hlu vy a tua hlui maw?” tatah aa tah.
Cawngsaw zawpui tah ma hratei a kong aa reipatlaw tlungmangpaw khah Farasi sahlo tah aa thui. Mataico, tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo takhei Zisu cawh tle pawtah behnah ing raevai sahlo khah aa taw he.
Zisu taco, “Naaning khatah cai cuitei ung neh ka, mataico a pa tawtupaw khatah ka sei a.
Pa hui he ceh ka, pa hmuh a bei ceh; ka ungnahpaw lang zong va sei khy bei ceh,” tatah a tah.
